CanadaPostInformationText.title: Address Entry Tips
CanadaPostInformationText.description: Tips on entering an address: Click in ?Line 1? to change the Country using the drop-down menu. When you begin typing into a field, AddressComplete will auto-populate recommended addresses. You may select an address or continue to manually enter an address. For USA residents, when manually entering in your address, you must provide your 9-digit ZIP Code Found here: https://tools.usps.com/zip-code-lookup.htm. Manual entries must spell out the province/state; abbreviations are not accepted.
